name: Food Truck Story
description:
Let's start a business! Food Truck Story is a realistic business simulation that recreates the day-to-day experiences involved in starting and running a micro business. 

In this game, you will act as a fried stuffed tofu micro business owner. You are challenged to grow your micro business to become profitable and successful. Finding the right employees, carefully managing budget, and developing a fantastic fried tofu recipe will be your key to success.

Play this game see if you could be a successful entrepreneur.
